name: Hull-Closeio
description: Automate customer interactions with your close.io CRM

private_settings.name: api_key
private_settings.title: Close.io API Key
private_settings.description: Find it via your close.io dashboard: Settings > Your API Keys

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Send *users* as contacts to Close.io when belonging to one of these segments

private_settings.name: synchronized_account_segments
private_settings.title: Send *accounts* as leads to Close.io when belonging to one of these segments

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments_hero
private_settings.headerTemplate:
The above lists of segments are whitelists. You need to *explicitely specify one or more segments* for which users or accounts and events shall be sent to Close.io.
If you do not specify any segment, no user, account or event will be sent to Close.io.
private_settings.title: Whitelisted Segments

private_settings.name: lead_status
private_settings.title: The lead status to use for creating new leads. If set to None the default status will be applied by close.io

private_settings.name: lead_attributes_outbound
private_settings.title: Send Account Attributes to Close.io
private_settings.description: Name and domain are sent automatically

private_settings.name: lead_attributes_inbound
private_settings.title: List of Lead fields to fetch from Close.io

private_settings.name: contact_attributes_inbound
private_settings.title: List of Contact fields to fetch from Close.io
